types.section:
{{fr-adj}}

# {{lb|fr|slang}} for something to have had a profound impact on a person, to have had one's worldview changed
# {{lb|fr|slang}} to be under the influence of someone, to be indoctrinated
# {{lb|fr|slang}} to be [[hooked]] on some activity (e.g. watching too much television)
types.html:
matrixé (feminine matrixée, masculine plural matrixés, feminine plural matrixées)

  1. (slang) for something to have had a profound impact on a person, to have had one's worldview changed
  2. (slang) to be under the influence of someone, to be indoctrinated
  3. (slang) to be hooked on some activity (e.g. watching too much television)
trans: for something to have had a profound impact on a person, to have had one's worldview changed
to be under the influence of someone, to be indoctrinated
to be hooked on some activity
